page.title: 18MAIN STREET FARMHOUSE
page.content: THE FARM HOUSE WAS BUILT 200 YEARS AGO AND IT WAS 2 COTTAGE WITH A THATCHED ROOF.ONE COTTAGE HAD 2 BED-ROOMS AND THE OTHER COTTAGE HAD 3 BED-ROOMS AND THERE WERE BARS ON THE TOP OF THE WINDOWS.THE HOUSE HAD A GREAT BIG CHINMNEY BREAST.ON ONE SIDE OF THE CHIMNEY THERE WAS A TRAP DOOR WHICH THE BOYS WHO SWEPT THE CHIMNEY USED TO HAVE TO CLIMB THOUGH.IT WAS REMOVED ONCE THAT THE HOUSE USED TO BE A POLICE STATION.THE HOUSE WAS HAUNTED BECAUSE SEVERAL FOOT STEPS WERE HEARD UP-STAIRS BUT NO ONE WAS THERE.WHERE THE BARN IS TODAY THERE USED TO BE 2 MORE COTTAGE'S.THE MAJOR CULLARD USED TO OWN THE FARM BEFORE MAJOR COWEN.DURING THE WAR THE FARM YARD WAS USED AS A TRACKER DEPOT FOR THE LAND ARMY.
